instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a clean, distraction-free interface. White space is a feature.
Use 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for all headings to give a modern tech feel.
The Sidebar should be subtle (slate-50) to differentiate from the main white workspace.
For the 'BalochAI' general chat, use a centered layout similar to standard LLM interfaces.
For PDF Chat, use a split-pane layout: PDF on the left (50%), Chat on the right (50%). Allow resizing if possible, or fixed ratio.
Use Shadcn 'ScrollArea' for the chat message list to ensure custom scrollbars.
Use Shadcn 'Dialog' for the PDF upload modal if not doing drag-and-drop directly on the empty state.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use the provided abstract images subtly if needed, or stick to clean solid colors.
The 'Model Selector' should be prominent in the header.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (upload success, error messages).
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
